allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add insurance business technology curriculum for IT developers and POs

Comprehensive 11-lesson curriculum covering:
- Insurance fundamentals, products, and core processes
- System architecture and data models
- API design and security compliance
- Development practices and testing strategies
- DevOps, deployment, and product owner guide

Each lesson includes learning objectives, diagrams, code examples,
key takeaways, and practical exercises.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
